content.text: Hey what's up?
I'm doing great! Just got back from a walk with my dog.
Oh nice! I love dogs. What breed is yours?
He's a Doberman Pinscher. He's a good boy.
Dobermans are great dogs! I've always wanted one.
They're a lot of work but they're so loyal and loving.
Yeah I've heard that. I think I'd be up for the challenge though.
I think you would be too. You seem like a great pet owner.
Thanks! I try my best. I love my animals.
That's great to hear. I'm sure they love you too.
I know they do. They're my best friends.
That's what pets are for! To be our best friends.
Exactly!
So what do you do for fun?
I like to go out with my friends, read, and cook.
That sounds fun! I like to go out with my friends too. I don't read much but I love to cook.
What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love making pasta dishes. I'm Italian so I grew up eating a lot of pasta.
Oh that's awesome! I love pasta too. I'm not Italian but my mom is so I grew up eating a lot of it too.
That's great! We should cook together sometime.
That would be fun! I'd love to learn some Italian recipes.
Sounds good! We can exchange recipes.
Sounds like a plan
